title: Jazz Willisau:  Bob Stewart, Arthur Blythe
description: Black and white vertically striped poster. On the black stripes, the green silhouette of a man playing the saxophone. On the white stripes, the red silhouette of a man playing the tuba. Text at top and bottom: "Jazz is Willison, Sa 26 Nov 05 20.30h, Foroom. Bob Stewart tuba, Arthur Blythe alto sax." 2005 Bosch Siedbruck AG Stans
name: Poster
